General.Name: Promotora Ambiental S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Promotora Ambiental, S.A.B. de C.V. provides environmental services in Mexico and Latin America. It offers waste management services, including collection, handling, and final disposal of waste from industrial, commercial, and municipal levels. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.
